wordpressPost.title: Simple Beam Deflection Calculator Using Excel Online
wordpressPost.content:
A simple beam deflection calculator for simply supported and cantilever beams. There is obviously functional limitations to excel online such as shape changing and macros / sub procedures and user defined functions.

Several basic shapes are included (circle, rectangle, I beam, T beam, circular hollow and rectangular hollow sections). Point load and uniformly distributed loading is implemented.

I may consider creating a more sophisticated version using javascript if I’m bored.
